explanation: [0-0] On a table sits an oversized cup bearing the Coca-Cola logo, filled with Coke. Two thick blue straws are in the cup, held by two people on either side. The person on the left wears a white shirt and an orange vest, with black hair. The person on the right wears a white shirt and a green vest, also with black hair, his eyes fixed on the person on the left. Behind them is a blue wall.

[0-5] The man in green nudges the man in orange with his arm. The man in orange looks at him in shock and throws a punch. The man in green covers his eye and falls backward. The scene cuts to the man in green sitting against a white wall, a blue bruise around his eye. He reaches out to touch the eye, his expression pained. The camera zooms in as the man in green suddenly extends a finger and opens his mouth wide, wiggling the finger. The camera zooms out to reveal the man in green pulling out a small can of colorful candy from behind him. He smiles happily and turns to leave. The camera zooms in on the man in green's hand as he fumbles with a light switch.

[5-13] The scene switches to the man in orange blowing bubbles in his Coke with a straw. He suddenly frowns and looks to the right, then turns back and sighs, putting down the straw and getting up to leave. At this moment, the man in green sneaks up to the table with his candy. The camera zooms in as the man in green pinches some candy in his hand. The camera zooms out as he throws the candy into the Coke and stirs it with the straw. He puts a finger to his lips, shushing the camera, then leaves.
